basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: Software Engineer | React • Node.js • PostgreSQL
basics.summary: Full-stack Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience building production web applications using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Skilled in designing scalable architectures, implementing REST APIs, and collaborating with product and engineering teams to deliver high-quality features. Passionate about clean code, continuous improvement, and leveraging technology for meaningful social impact.

work.name: Hawkins Computer Services
highlights: Maintained and refactored enterprise Java/GWT rental management app with focus on scalability and clean architecture
Built 6 third-party integrations (REST, GraphQL, and custom APIs)
Co-led front-end migration from legacy GWT to Vue.js, modernizing UI and improving maintainability
Implemented company-wide Test Driven Development (JUnit, PhpUnit, Cypress)
Deployed apps with Docker and Git-based CI/CD pipelines
Introduced Agile (Scrum/Kanban) workflows and team-wide code reviews

work.name: AAM, USA
highlights: Redesigned and rebuilt flagship checkout/cart system, improving performance and user experience
Co-designed and developed a React/TypeScript point-of-sale platform for 1,000+ users
Developed internal and client-facing tools with PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, and React in a custom MVC framework
Collaborated with 10-person development team using GitHub, Asana, and Microsoft Teams

projects.name: Movie Search React Showcase
projects.description: React-based movie search SPA built from a Figma design. Demonstrates React, Tailwind CSS, REST API integration, and frontend optimization.

projects.name: Concrete CMS Docker Stack
projects.description: Packaged Concrete CMS into a Dockerized deployment stack using docker-compose, enabling rapid rollout and scalable deployments.

projects.name: Java Integration Example
projects.description: Educational backend integration project in Java demonstrating design patterns, API development, and testing best practices.
